items.sentence: Are we still going to go over to Tom\'s after school?
Are you sure this is the place we\'re supposed to be?
I don\'t think we\'re going to make it to your party.
We spent all day searching for a way out of the cave.
What\'s the one thing you would\'ve done differently?
What\'s the real reason Tom didn\'t want to buy that?
What\'s the stupidest thing you\'ve ever seen Tom do?
When do you think you\'re going to finish doing that?
No one noticed that the picture was hung upside down.
When was the last time you went to an amusement park?
Where did Tom learn how to play the guitar like that?
The interior of Tom\'s house is decorated tastefully.
Tom knew that Mary said she wasn\'t going to do that.
Tom knew that he couldn\'t do what needed to be done.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to be able to do that.
Tell Tom that I already know how to get to his place.
Tell Tom what you think about the article Mary wrote.
Are you having second thoughts about getting married?
Do you think it would be possible for Tom to do that?
Tom is better at speaking French than the rest of us.
Tom didn\'t know who to invite to his birthday party.
Tom didn\'t want to kiss Mary, but she wanted him to.
I doubt that Tom will tell Mary what really happened.
Tom used to bring me here to swim when I was younger.
Tom walked over to the sink and turned on the faucet.
Neither Tom nor Mary is very good at speaking French.
Tom is always threatening to quit, but he never does.
Tom is going to ask Mary if she can help us tomorrow.
I\'m fairly certain that Tom will pass today\'s exam.
Have you ever pretended to be sick when you weren\'t?
Tom doesn\'t have to eat this if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom wondered whether Mary regretted what she\'d done.
Tom gave Mary good advice, but she didn\'t follow it.
If you don\'t help Tom, he\'ll have trouble doing it.
Tom felt exhausted after chopping wood all afternoon.
Tom finally got the courage to ask Mary to marry him.
Tom folded the blankets and put them into the closet.
I didn\'t expect Tom to ask me that kind of question.
Why don\'t you tell me the way you think it happened?
You and I both know that that isn\'t going to happen.
Tom won\'t be going to Boston with us, but Mary will.
Tom and I have been friends since junior high school.
Tom and I have been working together for a long time.
Tom knew Mary shouldn\'t be doing what she was doing.
There were a lot of things Tom didn\'t tell us about.
Tom said no one else wanted to go to Boston with him.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning to do that.
I can\'t even begin to imagine what Tom went through.
Tom showed me some pictures of him when he was a kid.
Tom soon realized there was someone else in the room.
